Articles.Content:
![jfKuc8I.png](http://i.imgur.com/jfKuc8I.png)

The Pontiac Torpedo is widely known as one of the first muscle cars, and was often used as a staff car.

Parts: 390

Mass: 11.9 tons

Cost: ![rwGmwPktxe9GN9sIWk4qgs7mx8kGM36BYxgXkPFcrPvMMOFmUS-llR98o0Huo9APlvB6MtXHhY5JC43mKP5FOyT7guTZTim5V__BhS316zEpYK4MhkNBDarF8mnSUmwNlYVsKHA](https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/rwGmwPktxe9GN9sIWk4qgs7mx8kGM36BYxgXkPFcrPvMMOFmUS-llR98o0Huo9APlvB6MtXHhY5JC43mKP5FOyT7guTZTim5V__BhS316zEpYK4MhkNBDarF8mnSUmwNlYVsKHA)138695

[**Download**](http://www./download/8ds5jlzbwyum92p/Pontiac_Torpedo_Deluxe.craft)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/vQJPF)

This replica is built to ~130% of the original, as with all my land-based vehicles due to the size of wheels in the game. It features a fuel cell engine, and must be turned on with action group 1 and off with action group 2. Lights are toggled with action group 3. 

This is part of my WWII Replica Project (see signature)

Enjoy!

Hey man. I haven't seen a car like this built before. It's a nice build man. Could be cleaner though. 

 I always hold a very back a day or two to go over every inch with the offset tools. And Im not sure about the rear end.

 Apart from that it's really cool looking. And sits amazingly next to the old timey aircraft. Rep for you good man.

 I've given out too much.. I will rep ya later.
Nice work! I love how it looks with the planes. That hood shape is just amazing!

Amazing car ! May be smooth a bit but the hard work is done !

Congratz & Rep !
